verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sounding the Heaven of heavens again, Ringing the earth with His glory and Name, Ocean and mountain, stream, forest and flower Echo His praises and tell of His power.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Judah, the glory and praise to the Lamb, Glory the robe and the harp and the psalm, Singing the song of the Lamb that was slain, Dying in weakness, but rising to reign.{/lang-eng}
